chatbot.title: Help
chatbot.intro: Hola, este es el chat de orientaci√≥n automatizado de Alkemio. Puede proporcionarte respuestas basadas en la documentaci√≥n de Alkemio. ¬øQu√© est√°s buscando?

infoDialog.title: Ayuda Alkemio
infoDialog.content:
Use the Alkemio guidance chat to get automatic answers to your questions from Alkemio‚Äôs documentation.

This is an __advanced search module__ powered by a widely used online generative AI engine. It interprets your question and guides you to the most relevant help from the Alkemio help center. You can see the sources of the answers as well.

__Don‚Äôt worry about your privacy:__ the search engine does not use or store any user data, and it cannot link the interaction to individual users. If you need to contact the Alkemio team, please click the contact button below.

feedback.tooltip: This message has been automatically generated based on Alkemio‚Äôs documentation. Your feedback is highly relevant to us!

references.title: New user? Visit our Getting Started pages!
Find your answers in the Help Center or FAQ

3.title: Te presentamos... My Dashboard!
3.content:
We're very excited to welcome you at your new Alkemio "Homepage": My Dashboard. Here you can easily resume your work and stay updated on your communities. Have a look at these new features:

üöÄ Quick access to your favorite communities You‚Äôll see the last 5 places that you‚Äôve contributed to, whether they are Spaces, Challenges, or Opportunities. To see more, just click on the button on the right.

üîî All the latest activities in one place The Recent Contributions panel shows you everything that‚Äôs going on in your communities. You can filter by Spaces and by your role in them.

...and there is more:

  • Don‚Äôt miss any invitations: they are now shown in the New Memberships block
  • Keep track of your own latest activities with My Latest Contributions
  • Discover new templates from the Innovation Library
  • Make the most out of Alkemio with the ‚ÄòTips and Tricks‚Äô
  • Good to know: The exact layout of your Dashboard depends on whether you're signed in or not, and whether you have any memberships.


Scroll down to explore what else is on your new Dashboard, and tell us what you think! We‚Äôve created a discussion on the [forum](/forum) to hear your feedback.

2.title: Tenemos noticias emocionantes, ¬°ya sali√≥ una nueva versi√≥n llena de funcionalidades interesantes!
2.content:
Exciting news! We've refreshed the main navigation of the platform to let the focus be on your community. Alkemio as a brand is now less visible, taking the role of "powering" your Space. This big and important change also allowed us to simplify the user navigation. So less buttons to distract you from your work inside your Space.

The new layout is as follows:
  • Menu: besides your personal profile and settings, you will now find a menu that includes all the jobs you can do on the platform outside of your Space
  • Navigation: in the top left, you will find the icons of the home page, Space, or Challenge to navigate back
  • Search: as users were often confused by the two search options (in the Space or the entire platform), we have combined them into one search function with the option to filter
We hope this release will bring you one step closer to efficient collaboration! **[Click here](https://alkem-25488729.hs-sites-eu1.com/alkemio-release-2023-11-01)** to read all about the latest changes.

1.title: We have exciting news, a new release full of interesting functionalities is out!
1.content:
After a big refresh of the lay-out and functionalities of the Space, it was time to dive into the Challenges & Opportunities and make some updates.

They are:
  • A more prominent role for the innovation flow that will guide your Challenge or Opportunity.
  • Now you can easily invite both Alkemio users as well as external people to "my" Space.


Among others! **[Click here](https://alkem-25488729.hs-sites-eu1.com/alkemio-release-2023-07-20)** to read all about the latest changes.

cookie.consent: Haciendo click en "Aceptar todas las cookies", usted acepta que se almacenen cookies en su dispositivo para mejorar la navegaci√≥n por el sitio y analizar su uso.
cookie.settings: Al visitar un sitio web, alguna informaci√≥n puede almacenarse en su explorador en forma de cookies. Esta informaci√≥n puede ser sobre usted, sus preferencias y su dispositivo. Sobre todo, esta informaci√≥n es usada para hacer que el sitio web funcione lo mejor posible. Algunos sitios web las usan con fines de mercadotecnia. Como Alkemio no permite ning√∫n tipo de publicidad en su sitio web, solo distinguimos dos tipos de cookies.
cookie.technical: Cookies t√©cnicamente necesarias: le permiten navegar y utilizar las funciones b√°sicas y almacenar sus preferencias.
cookie.analysis: Cookies de an√°lisis: permiten determinar c√≥mo interact√∫an los visitantes con nuestros servicios para mejorar la experiencia del usuario.

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.public: Public: this space and its contents are visible for everyone on the platform. Users can only contribute if they are a member.
visibility.private: Private: this space is visible for everyone on the platform, but the content is only visible for members.

membership.title: Membership
membership.noApplicationRequired: No Application required: all Alkemio users can directly join, without you having to review their application. Others will first have to create an Alkemio account, but can then also join this Space directly.
membership.applicationRequired: Application required: if people want to become a member, they have to fill in the application form. You receive their applications (see Community tab here) and can choose to accept these or not. If you want, you can choose to leave the form empty.
membership.invitationOnly: Invitation only: users can only become a member after you‚Äôve invited them (which you can do from the Community tab here) or if they are added manually. There is no Apply or Join button for others to click.
membership.hostOrganizationJoin: Host organization: allow people who are associated with {{host}} to directly join, without having to apply or be invited.

memberActions.title: Member Actions
memberActions.createBlocks: Create Blocks: allow members to create blocks for collaboration tools & posts. If you deactivate this, members will still be able to contribute to existing posts and calls, but will not be able to create new blocks.
memberActions.createChallenges: Create Challenges: allow members to create Challenges in this Space. If you deactivate this, you can still create Challenges yourself and add other people as an admin inside the Challenge.

registration.header: Crear una cuenta para empezar a usar Alkemio
registration.introduction:
¬°Bienvenido a Alkemio! Alkemio facilita la gesti√≥n de Desaf√≠os y tiene colaboradores, desde cualquier lugar, trabajando juntos en soluciones. Los desaf√≠os ocupan un lugar central. El enfoque est√° en el destino.

help-dialog.title: ¬øEn busca de ayuda?
help-dialog.text:
Queremos ayudarte a usar con √©xito la plataforma Alkemio, y para ello queremos facilitar el proceso de utilizaci√≥n y interacci√≥n. Solo asi podemos ayudarte a marcar la diferencia en los temas que son importantes para ti.

Haga clic en los iconos de abajo para encontrar respuestas a sus preguntas, p√≥ngase en contacto con el equipo de Alkemio para obtener asistencia o simplemente empieza!
